${modID}:Veteran.NAME: Veteran

${modID}:Veteran.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This card is a copy of the upgraded Common ${modID}:Combat_Art of your equipped weapon.

${modID}:Shove.NAME: Shove

${modID}:Reposition.NAME: Reposition
${modID}:Reposition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Dexterity grants Deflect instead of additional Block.

${modID}:Discipline.NAME: Discipline
${modID}:Discipline.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Select a weapon NL type to equip.

${modID}:Zeal.NAME: Zeal
${modID}:Zeal.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL This turn, you NL are weapon-strong.

${modID}:AlertStance.NAME: Alert Stance
${modID}:AlertStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain your hand NL this turn. NL End your turn.

${modID}:Tantivy.NAME: Tantivy
${modID}:Tantivy.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Draw 1 card. NL Gain !${modID}:magicTempDex! temp. Dexterity.

${modID}:Blossom.NAME: Blossom
${modID}:Blossom.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable. NL Gain !M! Artifact.

${modID}:Armsthrift.NAME: Armsthrift
${modID}:Armsthrift.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Deflect. NL Choose to upgrade your hand's Attacks, Skills, or Powers for the rest of combat.

${modID}:CrosswiseCut.NAME: Crosswise Cut
${modID}:CrosswiseCut.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Deflect.

${modID}:FrozenLance.NAME: Frozen Lance
${modID}:FrozenLance.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Dexterity affects NL this damage !M! times.

${modID}:WildAbandon.NAME: Wild Abandon
${modID}:WildAbandon.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage NL to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust a card.

${modID}:WaningShot.NAME: Waning Shot
${modID}:WaningShot.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Consume 4 ${modID}:Deflect to apply -1 Strength.

${modID}:CuttingGale.NAME: Cutting Gale
${modID}:CuttingGale.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhume a random non-Status/Heal card. NL Exhaust a card.
${modID}:CuttingGale.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhume a random non-Status/Heal card. NL Exhaust up to 1 card.

${modID}:DyingBlaze.NAME: Dying Blaze
${modID}:DyingBlaze.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage, increased by the size NL of your Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust !M! copies.
${modID}:DyingBlaze.FLAVOR: Exhausted copies don't trigger effects such as Dark Embrace.

${modID}:Bolting.NAME: Bolting
${modID}:Bolting.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Combat_Art. Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Your Lightning Orbs target ALL enemies. Exhaust.

${modID}:Nosferatu.NAME: Nosferatu
${modID}:Nosferatu.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Temp HP equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LevinSword.NAME: Levin Sword
${modID}:LevinSword.DESCRIPTION: Select one of NL ${modID}:Sword or ${modID}:Thunder. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Hex to your hand. Gain !M! Deflect.
${modID}:LevinSword.FLAVOR: On Exhaust, add Crosswise Cut and Bolting to your hand.

${modID}:FlameLance.NAME: Flame Lance
${modID}:FlameLance.DESCRIPTION: Select one of NL ${modID}:Lance or ${modID}:Fire. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain an Orb Slot NL for !M! turns.
${modID}:FlameLance.FLAVOR: On Exhaust, add Frozen Lance and Dying Blaze to your hand.

${modID}:HurricaneAxe.NAME: Hurricane Axe
${modID}:HurricaneAxe.DESCRIPTION: Select one of NL ${modID}:Axe or ${modID}:Wind. NL Deal !D! damage. Add an Anathema to your hand. Exhaust a card.
${modID}:HurricaneAxe.FLAVOR: On Exhaust, add Wild Abandon and Cutting Gale to your hand.

${modID}:BeguilingBow.NAME: Beguiling Bow
${modID}:BeguilingBow.DESCRIPTION: Select one of NL ${modID}:Bow or ${modID}:Dark. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Lock-On.
${modID}:BeguilingBow.FLAVOR: On Exhaust, add a Waning Shot and Nosferatu to your hand.

${modID}:FlashSparrow.NAME: Flash Sparrow
${modID}:FlashSparrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are weapon-strong, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

${modID}:Relief.NAME: Relief
${modID}:Relief.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL On Exhaust, add a copy of this card to your hand. Exhaust.

${modID}:Pavise.NAME: Pavise
${modID}:Pavise.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less if using an ${modID}:Arm. Otherwise, select an ${modID}:Arm to equip. NL Gain !B! Block twice.

${modID}:Aegis.NAME: Aegis
${modID}:Aegis.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less if using a ${modID}:Tome. Otherwise, select a ${modID}:Tome to equip. NL Gain !B! Block twice.

${modID}:Charm.NAME: Charm
${modID}:Charm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. NL On Exhaust, gain [E] and add a copy to NL your draw pile.

${modID}:Healtouch.NAME: Healtouch
${modID}:Healtouch.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Exhaust up to !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s}. Gain !B! Block for each Exhausted card.

${modID}:EvenOddRhythm.NAME: Even/Odd Rhythm
${modID}:EvenOddRhythm.DESCRIPTION: Even Turn: Gain !B! Block and a Hex. NL Odd Turn: Gain !M! ${modID}:Deflect and an Anathema.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a Hex NL to your hand.
Gain !M! ${modID}:Deflect. NL Add an Anathema NL to your hand.

${modID}:SurpriseAttack.NAME: Surprise Attack
${modID}:SurpriseAttack.DESCRIPTION: Gain ${modID}:Deflect equal NL to your Block.

${modID}:Pass.NAME: Pass
${modID}:Pass.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw cards equal to NL the amount discarded.

${modID}:Locktouch.NAME: Locktouch
${modID}:Locktouch.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your held NL Statuses and Curses. NL Add an Anathema and a Hex to your hand.
${modID}:Locktouch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s}. NL Exhaust your held Statuses and Curses. NL Add an Anathema and a Hex to your hand.

${modID}:Gamble.NAME: Gamble
${modID}:Gamble.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL On Exhaust, add a random ${modID}:Combat_Art to your hand; NL it costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:RallySpectrum.NAME: Rally Spectrum
${modID}:RallySpectrum.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temp. Strength, Focus, and Dexterity. Choose the order they are gained.

${modID}:SpecialDance.NAME: Special Dance
${modID}:SpecialDance.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: NL !M! temp. Strength, NL !M! temp. Focus, or NL !M! temp. Dexterity.
${modID}:SpecialDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Choose one: NL !M! temp. Strength, NL !M! temp. Focus, or NL !M! temp. Dexterity.

${modID}:Renewal.NAME: Renewal
${modID}:Renewal.DESCRIPTION: Reduce ALL of your NL debuffs by X. NL Shuffle an Anathema to your draw pile.
${modID}:Renewal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce ALL of your NL debuffs by X+1. NL Shuffle an Anathema to your draw pile.

${modID}:Acrobat.NAME: Acrobat
${modID}:Acrobat.DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 [E]. NL Shuffle a Hex to NL your draw pile.
${modID}:Acrobat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X+1 [E]. NL {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s}. NL Shuffle a Hex to NL your draw pile.

${modID}:MastersTactics.NAME: Master's Tactics
${modID}:MastersTactics.DESCRIPTION: Increase your hand size by !M! for the rest of combat. NL {@@}Draw !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s}.

${modID}:Prescience.NAME: Prescience
${modID}:Prescience.DESCRIPTION: If the first card NL you play in a turn NL is an Attack, NL gain !M! ${modID}:Deflect.
${modID}:Prescience.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. If the first NL card you play in a NL turn is an Attack, NL gain !M! ${modID}:Deflect.

${modID}:Patience.NAME: Patience
${modID}:Patience.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Deflect.

${modID}:Vantage.NAME: Vantage
${modID}:Vantage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose ${modID}:Deflect from an enemy attack, lose !M! less. ${modID}:Deflect damages NL ALL enemies.

${modID}:CreationPulse.NAME: Creation Pulse
${modID}:CreationPulse.DESCRIPTION: If you gain Stat Down, NL apply to ALL enemies: NL Strength: !M! Vulnerable. NL Dexterity: !M! Weak. NL Focus: !M! Lock-On.

${modID}:Expiration.NAME: Expiration
${modID}:Expiration.DESCRIPTION: Gain a Blue Candle or Medical Kit for the combat. When you Exhaust a card, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It seems that I already have both of these relics.

${modID}:DeathBlow.NAME: Death Blow
${modID}:DeathBlow.DESCRIPTION: At the start of NL your turn, gain NL !M! temp. Strength.
${modID}:DeathBlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Now and at the start NL of your turn, gain NL !M! temp. Strength.

${modID}:FiendishBlow.NAME: Fiendish Blow
${modID}:FiendishBlow.DESCRIPTION: At the start of NL your turn, gain NL !M! temp. Focus.
${modID}:FiendishBlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Now and at the start NL of your turn, gain NL !M! temp. Focus.

${modID}:WardingBlow.NAME: Warding Blow
${modID}:WardingBlow.DESCRIPTION: At the start of NL your turn, gain NL !M! temp. Dexterity.
${modID}:WardingBlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Now and at the start NL of your turn, gain NL !M! temp. Dexterity.

${modID}:SwiftStrikes.NAME: Swift Strikes
${modID}:SwiftStrikes.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Gain !B! Block, increased by your ${modID}:Deflect. NL Deal !D! damage twice.

${modID}:ExhaustiveStrike.NAME: Exhaustive Strike
${modID}:ExhaustiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL {@@}Exhaust up to !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s}.
${modID}:ExhaustiveStrike.FLAVOR: If weapon-strong, Exhaust up to 3 additional cards.

${modID}:HuntersVolley.NAME: Hunter's Volley
${modID}:HuntersVolley.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Consume !M! ${modID}:Deflect NL to Retain your hand NL for 2 turns.
${modID}:HuntersVolley.FLAVOR: If weapon-strong, Retain your hand for 1 (additional) turn.

${modID}:Excalibur.NAME: Excalibur
${modID}:Excalibur.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL {@@}At the start of your NL turn, draw !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s}.
${modID}:Excalibur.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL {@@}At the start of your NL turn, and again next NL turn, draw !M! card{!M!|1=|@=s}.
${modID}:Excalibur.FLAVOR: If weapon-strong, increase your hand size by 3.

${modID}:Bolganone.NAME: Bolganone
${modID}:Bolganone.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Deflect. NL Double your ${modID}:Deflect.
${modID}:Bolganone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Deflect. NL Triple your ${modID}:Deflect.
${modID}:Bolganone.FLAVOR: If weapon-strong, gain 3 Deflect before it is multiplied.

${modID}:Thoron.NAME: Thoron
${modID}:Thoron.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL ALL enemies lose NL !D! HP twice.
${modID}:Thoron.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL ALL enemies lose  NL !D! HP twice, as well NL as Barricade.

${modID}:Goetia.NAME: Goetia
${modID}:Goetia.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Favor. ${modID}:Combat_Art. NL Gain !B! Block twice. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Luna.NAME: Luna
${modID}:Luna.DESCRIPTION: Your next ${modID}:Combat_Art NL is played twice.

${modID}:Ignis.NAME: Ignis
${modID}:Ignis.DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to your current Focus. NL Gain Focus equal to your prior Strength. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Ignis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to your current Focus. Gain Focus equal to your prior Strength. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

${modID}:SealAtk4.NAME: Seal Atk 4
${modID}:SealAtk4.DESCRIPTION: The enemy NL loses !M! Strength. NL You lose 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:TipTheScales.NAME: Tip the Scales!
${modID}:TipTheScales.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain. NL On Exhaust, gain NL !M! Artifact.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have to Exhaust this card to gain its effect.

${modID}:Despoil.NAME: Despoil
${modID}:Despoil.DESCRIPTION: Gain a random potion NL between Flex Potion, NL Speed Potion, or NL Sage Potion. Exhaust.

${modID}:PartOfThePlan.NAME: Part of the Plan
${modID}:PartOfThePlan.DESCRIPTION: Play this as your first card only. {@@}Exhaust !M! random card{!M!|1=|@=s}. EVERYONE gets Barricade.

${modID}:MasterSeal.NAME: Master Seal
${modID}:MasterSeal.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Ritual. NL {@@}Gain !M! Orb Slot{!M!|1=|@=s}. NL Add an Anathema and a Hex to your hand.

${modID}:ChaosStyle.NAME: Chaos Style
${modID}:ChaosStyle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change your weapon type, NL gain !M! Block.

${modID}:QuickBurn.NAME: Quick Burn
${modID}:QuickBurn.DESCRIPTION: Attacks cost 0. NL Whenever you play an NL Attack, Exhaust it.

${modID}:GrandmasterForm.NAME: Grandmaster Form
${modID}:GrandmasterForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Whenever you NL Exhaust a card, NL gain !M! Artifact.
${modID}:GrandmasterForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you NL Exhaust a card, NL gain !M! Artifact.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The key to victory NL lies within.

${modID}:Hex.NAME: Hex
${modID}:Hex.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose !M! ${modID}:Deflect or 1 Strength next turn. NL Exhaust. On Exhaust, Channel 1 Lightning.
${modID}:Hex.FLAVOR: If you have Strength Down, NL you don't lose Strength.

${modID}:Anathema.NAME: Anathema
${modID}:Anathema.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose !M! ${modID}:Deflect or 1 Dexterity next turn. NL Exhaust. On Exhaust, Channel 1 Frost.
${modID}:Anathema.FLAVOR: If you have Dexterity Down, NL you don't lose Dexterity.

${modID}:DebugWeapon.NAME: Debug Weapon
${modID}:DebugWeapon.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply any weapon NL type onto the enemy. NL Purge.
${modID}:DebugWeapon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Apply any weapon NL type onto the enemy. NL Gain [E] [E]. Purge.

${modID}:RallyStrength.NAME: Rally Strength
${modID}:RallyStrength.DESCRIPTION: Gain temp. Strength. NL Gain temp. Focus. NL Gain temp. Dexterity.

${modID}:RallyMagic.NAME: Rally Magic
${modID}:RallyMagic.DESCRIPTION: Gain temp. Focus. NL Gain temp. Dexterity. NL Gain temp. Strength.

${modID}:RallyDefense.NAME: Rally Defense
${modID}:RallyDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain temp. Dexterity. NL Gain temp. Strength. NL Gain temp. Focus.

${modID}:UpgradeAttacks.NAME: Upgrade Attacks
${modID}:UpgradeAttacks.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade your hand's Attacks for the rest of combat.

${modID}:UpgradeSkills.NAME: Upgrade Skills
${modID}:UpgradeSkills.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade your hand's Skills for the rest of combat.

${modID}:UpgradePowers.NAME: Upgrade Powers
${modID}:UpgradePowers.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade your hand's Powers for the rest of combat.

${modID}:TempBlueCandle.NAME: Blue Candle
${modID}:TempBlueCandle.DESCRIPTION: All Curses are playable, Exhaust, and cost 1 HP. Hex and Anathema only cost 1 HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: All Curses are playable, Exhaust, and cost 1 HP.

${modID}:TempMedicalKit.NAME: Medical Kit
${modID}:TempMedicalKit.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable Status cards can be NL Exhausted for free.
